GoGuardian is like a digital gatekeeper, deciding what we can and can't access online. It's frustrating and limits our learning.
Using GoGuardian feels like being stuck in a digital cage. It's suffocating and makes learning online a chore.
I wish GoGuardian would give us more freedom to explore the internet. It's like they're afraid we'll break something.
GoGuardian's restrictions make me feel like I'm being treated like a little kid. It's insulting and gets in the way of my education.
I hate how GoGuardian slows down my internet. It's like trying to run with ankle weights on. It's just unnecessary.
